scripts.develop: npm install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower update && node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt develop
scripts.release: npm install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower update && node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt release
scripts.master: npm install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower update && node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt master
scripts.start: npm install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower update && node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt develop && <% if (props.generateAuth) {%>start node node_modules/apimocker/bin/apimocker.js -c mocks/config.json && <%}%>node node_modules/http-server/bin/http-server -a localhost -p 8080
